channel.title: Breaking-News on The Hogwarts Hoaxes
channel.description: Recent content in Breaking-News on The Hogwarts Hoaxes

item.title: St. Mungo's Unveils 'Skele-Grow 2.0': Now With Added Agility and a Reduced 'Wobbly Leg' Guarantee!
item.description:
St. Mungo’s Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries announced today a breakthrough in skeletal regeneration. Lead Healer Smethwyck, sporting a rather suspiciously straight spine himself, revealed the new and improved Skele-Grow potion, dubbed ‘Skele-Grow 2.0’.

‘For years,’ Healer Smethwyck began, wiping a bead of sweat from his brow (perhaps a side effect of original Skele-Grow?), ‘patients have complained of the dreaded ‘wobbly leg’ phenomenon post-regeneration. Not to mention the… shall we say… rigidity some experienced. Skele-Grow 2.0 addresses these concerns directly!’

item.title: Ministry Unveils Ambitious 'Beyond the Veil' Initiative: Wizarding Space Exploration?
item.description: In a stunning announcement that has sent ripples of excitement and apprehension throughout the wizarding world, the Ministry of Magic today unveiled ‘Project Beyond the Veil,’ a highly classified initiative aimed at exploring realms beyond the known magical universe. Sources within the Ministry confirm that the project is directly linked to unlocking the secrets of the Veil in the Department of Mysteries, long considered an impassable barrier between life and… something else.
